metadata.title: CVE-2016-20022 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 4.8, usb_parse_endpoint indrivers/usb/core/config.c does not validate the wMaxPacketSize field of anendpoint descriptor. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products thatare no longer supported by the supplier.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
